description:
Hello Truckers,


Is your business struggling to manage daily operations like managing shipments, driver location, trucking location, etc?


We have come up with the best dashboard design to ease the managing operations for the trucking business. 


Like Trucker Path, we have a simple yet unique app design for the trucking industry. Keep a track of active orders, driver details, GPS tracking, etc. 


What are your thoughts on this UI design for the trucking app? Would you like to add a few things or change the color? Get in touch with us to discuss further.
